website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W200's 12-megapixel sensor raises the price of an otherwise decent snapshot camera with little benefit. The W90 and W80 are better deals.
cons: Requires far more light for low ISO shots than most competitors
Exceptionally long flash-recycle time and disappointing shot-to-shot performance

customer_reviews.title: MegaPixels Are Not Everything!
customer_reviews.text: Interface and controls are a little quirky and seemingly not as user friendly as the DSC-W90 I was replacing. I loved the DSC-W90, but it quit working properly after 1-1/2 years, and Sony wanted $182 to repair it. I was particularly disappointed to find that the DSC-W200 camera does not have the capability to superimpose the date on the picture. If I had it to do over, I would have saved some money and bought the DSC-W80 which is probably more like the W90 I liked so well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Used but, I get what I paid for. All functions are working. This no.3 of the same camera, perfect for summer. No the best for limited lighting picture.
customer_reviews.author: Tadeusz Szyszka

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has the resolution of a digital SLR!! We married it with a Sony Pro Duo 8-gig memory stick. Best price on the net, too!! We use it when all we want to do is capture some candid shots without dragging out our serious equipment. Pocket size...great resolution...plenty of storage space... Ready...Set...Shoot!! Happy Hoildays, Smacka
customer_reviews.author: Smackafatty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small camera that takes great photos and is easy to use and carry when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: CONSUMER PRO

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for 90% of shots
customer_reviews.text: The best things about this camera is the form factor, good screen, and improved automated focus. This camera provides excellent resolution and capability. As an upgrade from a 3.1 Mp Cybershot it represents a smooth transition and upgrade that is satisfactory and expected. The low light capabilities are good but not great... some graininess comes thru circumstantially.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Peter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sony Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this camera. I had owned before, but recently, the W80 and W90 Sony cybershots. And now I have purchased this one, I can tell you it is a great camera. The resolution is impecable. I trully recommend it to those who want the best for non-Pro photographers.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for the amateur, its small and has excellent features, nice big screen. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: F Michael Mina

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera. Have used it already to Alaska. If only it would have a longer lens I could have had some photos with Wolfe's
customer_reviews.author: Sabine Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Sony Camera review
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased as a gift for my wife to use on an upcoming trip. The limited use so far has been very good. Easy to use small with a large screen and the pictures are great.
customer_reviews.author: Harry A. Hlavaty

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to my daughter. She can't stop shooting with it. The photos are great and so are the videos.
customer_reviews.author: A Ma

customer_reviews.title: My favorite camera
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best camera I have ever owned. I love it's small and portable size (I pretty much take it everywhere) and the pictures are crisp and beautiful. I rarely have to do much post processing because they really turn out wonderful straight out of the camera. I would be lost without my little cybershot buddy!
customer_reviews.author: Katie C. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for our daughter!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had admired her friend's Sony Cybershot, 10MP Digital Camera and asked that we give it too her for Christmas and Birthday. Her friend loves her camera and offered to assist in down-loading and any other needs. When we found the 12.1MP for about the same price we expected to pay for the 10MP, we jumped on it. Our daughter has not stopped taking pictures, they all turn out beautifully and her partner takes as many photos as she does. She is thrilled. Now, I'll have to save to get the same camera for our house!
customer_reviews.author: P. Sample

customer_reviews.title: Mr.
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, my only complain is the LCD, is not scratching proof, actually keeps getting scrath even with normal use, is bad quality, for instance with the same treatment mi IPOD screen is flawless, if you buy it make sure to have an screen protection film or something otherwise you will regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricio Lobos Riquelme

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. The screen is big and clear. I've had it for 2 years and i still love it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hufford

customer_reviews.title: Sony Camera Review
customer_reviews.text: The camera takes excellent pictures and is light and easy to use. I would like the screen to be a little larger and for a higher zoom. The dial is a bit of a problem in that it turns and I don't realize what mode I am taking the picture in. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Dot D.

customer_reviews.title: Still Going Good.
customer_reviews.text: AAAA++++. Really Very Good camera. Paid A Lot When I Purchased . Never Gave Any problems. Still Going Great. Very Good Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Satpal Jabbal

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cybershot 10.1
customer_reviews.text: I love my Sony Cybershot 10.1 It is crisp. Has been dropped many times...and works great....Thanks Sony....Great Camera
customer_reviews.author: Judy K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pics
customer_reviews.text: What a great all around camera...Very compact and easy to carry. The pictures are clear and the video feature is awesome...
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo Sanmartino

customer_reviews.title: Quallity
customer_reviews.text: This does all that it says it will but the computer connection is insane, keep the minature USB not this unique port that doen't fit anything else!Great pictures and HD is amazing but that port on the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I am crazy about this camera! I am NOT a professional photographer, but I've got to say, I take GREAT pictures with this camera. Very easy to use, small, compact, and takes good video.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Adams Trufant

customer_reviews.title: Nice equipment
customer_reviews.text: Sony 12.1 MP is an excellent equipment. It takes very clear pictures and videos. Problem is that it has sensitive lens and the camera should not fall or turn over once the lens are extended (not retracted) or you will need to go the the Sony repair shop to have it running well again. Would prefer a Canon which appears to be more durable but Canon does not have a 12.1MP camera.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Beltran

customer_reviews.title: sony cybershot 12.1 meg.
customer_reviews.text: The first camera i purchased had a problem. Amazon not only took it back,they sent me a replacement before i sent the broken one back! That is how a company should do buisness! The Sony is the best point & shoot camera i ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Spignesi

customer_reviews.title: This one is awesome, must buy
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought this camera, because it has extra high sensitivity (ISO 3200 and up to 6400)which is a very nice feature. You can take a picture in a low light condition and without flash light. I know the flash light is ganna hurt my baby's eyes and I don't want to pay a big bucks for SLR. It has done very good job so far. I like everything about this camera. I think this one will fit you whoever is going to have a baby.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wang

customer_reviews.title: sony cybershot dscw200 12.1mp digital camera
customer_reviews.text: What a camera! short battery life I thought. but still excellent in taking photos. pictures vivid and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mielke

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: It was a great camera for the week that I owned it. My camera was stolen a week from which I received it, so I can not give much of a review sorry.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sicotte

customer_reviews.title: Hello
customer_reviews.text: Hello, the Camera digital Sony Cybershot DSCW200 is excellent and with good resolution.Is not Touch panel
customer_reviews.author: Luis E. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSCW200 vs T-100
customer_reviews.text: Both the Sony W200 and Sony T100 cost about the same money. From Cnet.com (on the Sony W200) ... >>> Requires far more light for low ISO shots than most competitors; exceptionally long flash-recycle time and disappointing shot-to-shot performance; image-processing artifacts; LCD has poor off-angle viewing; proprietary USB cable. <<< Cnet.com professional rating for Sony W200: 6.4 Cnet.com Professional rating for Sony T100: EDITOR'S CHOICE 2007 !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allan Lee

customer_reviews.title: Horrible battery life and memory
customer_reviews.text: The battery life for the AA that this camera takes only lasts for about fifteen minutes of use and the memory on the camera alone only holds five pictures before its full.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL DELPH

product_meta.title: Sony Cybershot DSCW200 12.1MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and Super Steady Shot
product_meta.description: Sony Cybershot DSCW200 12.1MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and Super Steady Shot
feature_bullets: Included Accessories - NP-BG1 rechargeable battery, BC-CSG battery charger, A/V and USB multi-connector cables, Wrist strap & Software CD-ROM
12.1 Megapixels, up to 640x480 VGA at 30 fps MPEG VX Fine with Audio - We recommend purchasing an optional 4GB Memory Stick(R) Pro Duo
Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar Lens, 3x Optical Zoom, 2.0 (Precision) Digital Zoom
Lens Construction - 6 Elements in 5 Groups, 3 Aspheric Elements

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars46 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
